backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with product, category, order, inquiry, and site-content types plus in‑memory maps for storing them.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration that initializes a new categoryHeaders map on upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark palettes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, lazy loading, layout, and profile‑setup modal logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin UI for managing homepage carousel slides, including uploads, ordering, and updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryCa: Admin tool for managing up to five category carousel images and a redirect URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryIm: Component for uploading, ordering, and selecting primary category images with optimization support.
frontend/src/components/admin/HeaderCate: Manages header category navigation by letting admins upload optimized circular images and set redirect URLs for each category.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Displays customer inquiries and allows admins to write and send responses, showing pending or answered status.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Fetches and displays orders, lets admins update order status, view product names, and generate printable order summaries.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form for creating or editing products, including media upload with optimization, category selection, and inventory settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Lists products with images and pricing, enabling admins to add, edit, or delete items via the product form modal and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin form component that loads site content, allows editing multiple text fields, and submits updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCarousel: Carousel component that loads category slides, auto‑rotates them, and handles click navigation.
frontend/src/components/CategoryImageCar: Carousel component for category images with auto-rotation, hover pause, navigation controls, and optional redirect clicks.
frontend/src/components/checkout/CouponC: UI control for applying and removing coupon codes with inline validation and error messaging.
frontend/src/components/checkout/UpiQrCo: Generates and displays a UPI payment QR code and provides a copy-to-clipboard action.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPageStyl: Wrapper that applies a data attribute to scope customer page styles.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Footer component displaying logo, contact info, policies, dynamic year, and optional footer content from site settings.
frontend/src/components/HeaderCategoryNa: Renders a scrollable header navigation of product categories with optional redirect handling and icons.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: Homepage carousel showing enabled slides with auto-rotation, directional transitions, and clickable redirects.
frontend/src/components/HomeCategoryCaro: Displays each product category with its description and two associated CategoryImageCarousels.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout with header, navigation, auth handling, cart display, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: Modal showing order details, status, and cancellation flow with reason selection and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: Displays product images and video in a carousel with navigation and lazy loading.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving initial user profile details with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: Skeleton-based loading placeholder for lazy-loaded routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUiBodyAttribu: Hook that toggles a data-admin-ui attribute on the document body for admin-specific styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand-powered cart store handling items, quantity updates, totals, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryCarouselQu: React Query hooks for fetching and updating category carousel images and redirect URLs using the backend actor.
React Query hooks for retrieving and updating category header data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Simple hook that always returns the 'split' footer variant.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context/provider and hook for managing authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, categories, and carousel data using the actor and identity contexts.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom OKLCH color variables, brand colors, utility classes, and component styling for the app’s theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity providers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, and updating order statuses with product lookup and date filters.
frontend/src/pages/admin/CategoryEditPag: Admin page for editing a category’s details, images, and display order with save and validation logic.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard, checking admin status and displaying product, order, inquiry, and category stats with management interfaces.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, requiring authentication, and allows viewing items, modifying quantities, removing products, and navigating to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/categories/AnkletsPag: Empty placeholder page for an Anklets category.
frontend/src/pages/categories/BridalJewe: Empty placeholder page for a Bridal Jewellery category.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryNo: Empty placeholder page intended for displaying a missing category message.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryPa: Reusable category page showing filtered products, handling cart actions, authentication checks, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/categories/LabGrownDi: Renders the generic category template for lab-grown diamond jewellery.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow with address entry, coupon logic, UPI payment, and order creation. Redirects unauthenticated users or empty carts and manages pricing calculations.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated contact form for submitting inquiries. Validates input and sends customer inquiries via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Displays customer dashboard with order and inquiry summaries, status tags, and order detail modal. Requires login and fetches user orders and inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows homepage with carousel, category carousels, and product grid. Supports adding items to cart and navigating to product details or cart.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists customer orders with status indicators and detail modal. Requires authentication and loads both orders and product data.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Empty placeholder page for payment failure handling.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows payment success message with next steps and navigation to dashboard or home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCategoryPage.t: Displays products for a given category, validates the category slug, filters products, and provides cart and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info with media, price, stock, quantity controls, and actions to add to cart or buy.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileDetailsPage.ts: Loads and edits the authenticated user's profile with validation and save functionality.
frontend/src/utils/device.ts: Detects whether the user is on a mobile device using userAgentData or fallback regex.
frontend/src/utils/mediaOptimization.ts: Provides client-side image resizing/compression and basic video preview generation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Utility functions for cart pricing, coupon validation, discounts, INR formatting, and line‑item totals.
frontend/src/utils/productCategories.ts: Defines product category metadata and helpers to validate, lookup, and list categories.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Builds UPI deep links and generates service‑specific URIs for payments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, containers, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state for an e-commerce site, including features, admin behavior, known issues, and new feature requests. Used as structured metadata for build planning and tracking feature versions.
